[i]Crackling Flame[/i] – When The Flame Emperor enters or is turned face up, she deals 5 damage to target creature.
[i]Dark Secret[/i] – Whenever you turn another permanent face up, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[i]Vile Approach[/i] – Face down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Disguise {3}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
